name: SUMEG(SUPER ULTRA MEGA EXTRA GAME)
description:
SUMEG(or App4) is a game where you control the vertical position of 6 triangles with 12 buttons. The black triangles may not meet the the white rectangles or it's game over. The colors of the buttons change so pressing them will affect a different triangle - the one on the same color field as the color of the button. The are 3 difficulty levels affecting the movement speed of the white rectangles.
It's a MULTITASK type game propably.
The apk file is about 4.39MB and the app about 3.32MB.
Uses android level about 10, should run on android 2 and above.

#android #multitask #indiedev #indiegame
